column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////AMAZING pizza! Loved that we were able to put our pizza order in (when we had a 40 minute wait) and walk across the street to a bar while we waited. They texted us when the table was ready
column2: we sat down ordered the cheese bread and a round of drinks(all came within 10 minutes) and as we were finishing the first round the pizza arrived. All perfectly made and great timing! The pizza was awesome
column3: loved the crust! The staff was friendly and inviting. WILL be going back! 5+
